Reviews.Title: “Cheating hotel - Avoid Central Inn Berlin!”
Reviews.Author: Moonbabyxox
Reviews.Content: booked hotel bookingcom booked 1 comfort apartment bookingcom photos nice spacious bedroom nice spacious living written comfort apartments feature 2 bathrooms liked photos booked 1 comfort apartment single 7 nights checked yesterday hotel staff barely spoke english demanded pay 100 upfront paid trusted bookingcom brought tiny corridor tiny tiny single bed tiny tiny living wasnt promised comfort apartment spacious bedroom double bed nice living am stuck terrible hotel hotel staff rude barely speak english dont bookingcom provide people false info central inn hotel cheat people avoid central inn

Reviews.Title: “Simple hotel, clean room, very good location”
Reviews.Author: David R
Reviews.Content: hotel recomend ration pricequality pay arrived paid cash biggest advantage location hotel close central train station walk cca 10 minutes bus stop located front hotel accommodated single shower wc changed towels day bathroom clean wifi signal weak breakfast nextdoor restaurant sufficient

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel I have ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: dai0812
Reviews.Content: arrived late evening colleagues warned look closely true hotel dark tired absolutely stank smoke couldnt sleep couldnt stretch arms touching walls bathroom managed 1 night leave 1 hour check pay 80 remaining 4 days worth leave

Reviews.Title: “look for another place”
Reviews.Author: u_serial
Reviews.Content: despite location near hauptbahnhof photos internet hotel looks nice hotel sucks 10 sqm sit toilet brush teeth windows loud night hear backyard departments music vacuum cleaner etc service bad inflexible prepared pay cash exact amount unbelievable advise stay avoid annoyance

Reviews.Title: “Good for the price”
Reviews.Author: ldeit
Reviews.Content: spent 2 people traveling budget europe hotel short walk hauptbahnhof little worried outside holiday inn american 4person plenty space bathroom spotless paid extra 5euros person breakfast available weekend restaurant attached breads marinated vegetables scrambled eggs cereal getting typical german breakfast luxury clean affordable pension central location

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Central Inn
HotelInfo.Address: Alt-Moabit 126, 10557 Berlin, Germany
